name: Pokemon Bumble Bee Yellow
description:
This is a Pokemon Fan game I made when I was 12 after falling in love with Pokemon. It's storyline is quite ridiculous and I love it. Great for a laugh if you're looking for bootleg games.

It follows main character Ashley and her bestfriend Saffy (Sapphire) move into a new town and getting involved with the pokemon trial. However the trial gets sabotaged!

It's only half and hour, have fun!

- I am in the works of making amazing projects, this is just a filler until it is done.

Also there is a sequal called Pokemon Gastly Purple and Pokemon Ledyba Red!
